channel.title: Buttons not working
channel.description:
So I added all the SoF Codes from here: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/403203-pi-simple-fortune-wheel.html
Now this button wont work. I want to make this button the SoF button. But I dont have the downloaded SoF mini button. Can someone help me fix this button and help get my SoF working? [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2vkf86g.jpg[/img]

item.title: Buttons not working
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

Look for things mentioning:

16 is the tabID for that slot.

item.title: Buttons not working
item.dc:creator: @PI_Developer PI_Developer
item.description:
@PI_Developer wrote:

[quote=“brunches, post:3, topic:526211”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=644955.msg4338840#msg4338840 date=1374805714]
enable the tab.
handle clicking of the area in the client.
show the interface.

one of these (or more) are not working.
[/quote]
I have no idea how to do that. Sorry I’m new to coding.[/quote]
Client sided: you have to find that specific tab and un-comment it I think. He said there will be more than 1.
Now go look up the rest on your own

Read full topic
